name: Yandere.Id
description:
Hello everyone. My name is Rei-chan and I created Yandere.Id as part of a college project in a course called Digital Humanities, the Interactive Fiction/e-literature Unit. While I made this game for school, I did really enjoy the process, as I've been working on this story for literally several years. I decided to make it available for my friends to play and explore, but if anyone else is interested, this is free for them to enjoy as well.

Yandere.Id is a game about a workaholic web comic artist who, alongside of her muses, creates amazing pieces of fiction. Her muses, however, are not what they seem to be...
